sentences.sContent: Politeness and truth are often mutually incompatible.
sentences.sCn: 礼貌和实话往往互不相容。

sentences.sContent: Business interests are incompatible with public office.
sentences.sCn: 商业利益与公职不可兼得。

sentences.sContent: ...has been discovering the hard way that admitting people with incompatible cultures is an irreversible decision with incalculable consequences...

synos.tran: [数]不相容的；矛盾的；不能同时成立的

trans.tranOther: two things that are incompatible cannot exist or be accepted together
